notes.title: **ToonTasks**
points: - Dialogue fixes in Barnacle Boatyard and Ye Olde Toontowne.
- Fixed issue with 15 laff ubers losing their mainline ToonTask in the beginning of the game.
- Fixed issue with getting disconnected when talking to NPCs with uncompleted disguises while on a disguise completion task.

notes.title: **Outback Event**
points: - Significantly buffed Didgeridollar gains from turning in ToonTask parts. It is now a 30% chance to be awarded 7-10 Didgeridollars.

notes.title: **Misc**
points: - Fixed crash from closing out of a toon's TAP too fast.
- Turkeys can no longer show up when hitting the 'Shuffle' button in Make-a-Toon.
